contents.zh-CHS: 然后，服务器必须更新调度对象资源中每个“ATTENDEE”iCalendar属性的“PARTSTAT”iCalendar属性参数值，以匹配回复中指示的更改（考虑到“ATTENDEE”属性可能已创建新的重写iCalendar组件，以指示重复事件的一个或多个实例上的不同参与状态）。

contents.text: The server MUST also update or add the "SCHEDULE-STATUS" property parameter on each matching "ATTENDEE" iCalendar property and set its value to that of the "REQUEST-STATUS" property in the reply, or to "2.0" if "REQUEST-STATUS" is not present (also taking into account recurrence instances). If there are multiple "REQUEST-STATUS" properties in the reply, the "SCHEDULE-STATUS" property parameter value is set to a comma-separated list of status codes, one from each "REQUEST-STATUS" property.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器还必须在每个匹配的“ATTENDEE”iCalendar属性上更新或添加“SCHEDULE-STATUS”属性参数，并将其值设置为回复中“REQUEST-STATUS”属性的值，或者如果“REQUEST-STATUS”不存在，则将其设置为“2.0”（还考虑到重复实例）。如果回复中有多个“请求状态”属性，“计划状态”属性参数值设置为状态代码的逗号分隔列表，每个“请求状态”属性中有一个状态代码。

contents.text: The server SHOULD send scheduling messages to all the other "Attendees" indicating the change in participation status of the "Attendee" replying, subject to the recurrence requirements of Section 3.2.6.
contents.zh-CHS: 根据第3.2.6节的重复要求，服务器应向所有其他“与会者”发送计划消息，指示“与会者”回复的参与状态的变化。

contents.text: The scheduling message MUST only appear in the "Organizer's" scheduling Inbox collection once all automatic processing has been done.
contents.zh-CHS: 只有在完成所有自动处理后，计划邮件才能出现在“组织者的”计划收件箱集合中。

contents.text: 4.3. Default Calendar Collection
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3. 默认日历集合

contents.text: The server processes scheduling messages received for an "Attendee" by creating a new scheduling object resource in a calendar collection belonging to the "Attendee", when one does not already exist. A calendar user that is an "Attendee" in a scheduling operation MUST have at least one valid calendar collection available. If there is no valid calendar collection, then the server MUST reject the attempt to deliver the scheduling message to the "Attendee".
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器通过在属于“与会者”的日历集合中创建一个新的调度对象资源来处理为“与会者”接收的调度消息（如果该日历集合不存在）。日程安排操作中的“与会者”日历用户必须至少有一个有效的日历集合可用。如果没有有效的日历集合，则服务器必须拒绝尝试将日程安排消息传递给“与会者”。

contents.text: Servers MAY provide support for a default calendar collection -- that is, the calendar collection in which new scheduling object resources will be created. The CALDAV:schedule-default-calendar-URL WebDAV property, which can be present on the scheduling Inbox collection of a calendar user, specifies whether this calendar user has a default calendar collection. See Section 9.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器可以提供对默认日历集合的支持——即，将在其中创建新的调度对象资源的日历集合。CALDAV:schedule default calendar URL WebDAV属性可出现在日历用户的计划收件箱集合中，用于指定此日历用户是否具有默认日历集合。见第9.2节。

contents.text: Servers SHOULD create new scheduling object resources in the default calendar collection, if the CALDAV:schedule-default-calendar-URL WebDAV property is set.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果设置了CALDAV:schedule default calendar URL WebDAV属性，服务器应在默认日历集合中创建新的调度对象资源。

contents.text: Servers MAY allow clients to change the default calendar collection by changing the value of the CALDAV:schedule-default-calendar-URL WebDAV property on the scheduling Inbox collection. However, the server MUST ensure that any new value for that property refers to a valid calendar collection belonging to the owner of the scheduling Inbox collection.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器可能允许客户端通过更改“计划收件箱”集合上的CALDAV:schedule default calendar URL WebDAV属性的值来更改默认日历集合。但是，服务器必须确保该属性的任何新值都引用属于计划收件箱集合所有者的有效日历集合。

contents.text: Servers MUST reject any attempt to delete the default calendar collection.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器必须拒绝删除默认日历集合的任何尝试。

contents.text: 4.3.1. Additional Method Preconditions
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.1. 附加方法前提条件

contents.text: This specification defines additional method preconditions (see Section 16 of WebDAV [RFC4918]) to provide machine-parseable information in error responses.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范定义了额外的方法先决条件（参见WebDAV[RFC4918]第16节），以在错误响应中提供机器可解析信息。

contents.text: 4.3.1.1. CALDAV:default-calendar-needed Precondition
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.1.1. CALDAV：需要的默认日历

contents.text: Name: default-calendar-needed
contents.zh-CHS: 名称：需要默认日历

contents.text: Namespace:  urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav
Apply to: DELETE
contents.zh-CHS: 适用于：删除

contents.text: Use with: 403 Forbidden
contents.zh-CHS: 使用：403禁止

contents.text: Purpose: (precondition) -- The client attempted to delete the calendar collection currently referenced by the CALDAV:schedule-default-calendar-URL property, or attempted to remove the CALDAV: schedule-default-calendar-URL property on the scheduling Inbox collection on a server that doesn't allow such operations.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：（前提条件）--客户端试图删除CALDAV:schedule default calendar URL属性当前引用的日历集合，或试图删除不允许此类操作的服务器上的scheduling Inbox集合上的CALDAV:schedule default calendar URL属性。

contents.text: Definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义：

contents.text: <!ELEMENT default-calendar-needed EMPTY>
4.3.1.2. CALDAV:valid-schedule-default-calendar-URL Precondition
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3.1.2. CALDAV:有效的计划默认日历URL先决条件

contents.text: Name: valid-schedule-default-calendar-URL
contents.zh-CHS: 名称：有效的计划默认日历URL

contents.text: Namespace:  urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav
Apply to: PROPPATCH
contents.zh-CHS: 适用于：PROPPATCH

contents.text: Use with: 403 Forbidden
contents.zh-CHS: 使用：403禁止

contents.text: Purpose: (precondition) -- The client attempted to set the CALDAV: schedule-default-calendar-URL property to a DAV:href element that doesn't reference a valid calendar collection. Note: Servers that do not allow clients to change the CALDAV:schedule-default-calendar-URL property would simply return the DAV:cannot-modify-protected-property precondition defined in Section 16 of WebDAV [RFC4918].
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：（前提条件）--客户端试图将CALDAV:schedule default calendar URL属性设置为不引用有效日历集合的DAV:href元素。注意：不允许客户端更改CALDAV:schedule默认日历URL属性的服务器只会返回WebDAV[RFC4918]第16节中定义的DAV:cannot modify protected property前提条件。

contents.text: Definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义：

contents.text: <!ELEMENT valid-schedule-default-calendar-URL EMPTY>
5. Request for Busy Time Information
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 请求繁忙时间信息

contents.text: Busy time information of one or more calendar users can be determined by submitting a POST request targeted at the scheduling Outbox collection of the calendar user requesting the information (the "Organizer"). To accomplish this, the request body MUST contain a "VFREEBUSY" calendar component with the "METHOD" iCalendar property set to the value "REQUEST" as specified in Section 3.3.2 of iTIP [RFC5546]. The resource identified by the Request-URI MUST be a resource collection of type CALDAV:schedule-outbox (Section 2.1). The "ORGANIZER" property value in the "VFREEBUSY" component MUST match one of the calendar user addresses of the owner of the Outbox collection.
contents.zh-CHS: 一个或多个日历用户的忙时信息可以通过提交一个POST请求来确定，该POST请求的目标是请求该信息的日历用户的计划发件箱集合（“组织者”）。为此，请求正文必须包含一个“VFREEBUSY”日历组件，其“METHOD”iCalendar属性设置为iTIP[RFC5546]第3.3.2节中规定的值“request”。请求URI标识的资源必须是CALDAV:schedule outbox类型的资源集合（第2.1节）。“VFREEBUSY”组件中的“ORGANIZER”属性值必须与发件箱集合所有者的日历用户地址之一匹配。

contents.text: A response to a busy time request that indicates status for one or more calendar users MUST be an XML document with a CALDAV:schedule-response XML element as its root element. This element MUST contain one CALDAV:response element for each calendar user, with each such element in turn containing elements that indicate which calendar user they correspond to, the scheduling status for that calendar user, any error codes, and an optional description. For a successful busy time request, a CALDAV:calendar-data element is also present for each calendar user, containing the actual busy time information (i.e., an iCalendar "VFREEBUSY" component). See Section 10 for details on the child elements. See Appendix B.5 for an example busy time request and response.
contents.zh-CHS: 指示一个或多个日历用户状态的繁忙时间请求的响应必须是一个XML文档，其根元素为CALDAV:schedule-response-XML元素。此元素必须为每个日历用户包含一个CALDAV:response元素，每个此类元素依次包含指示其对应的日历用户、该日历用户的计划状态、任何错误代码和可选描述的元素。对于成功的繁忙时间请求，每个日历用户都会有一个CALDAV:calendar数据元素，其中包含实际的繁忙时间信息（即iCalendar“VFREEBUSY”组件）。有关子元素的详细信息，请参见第10节。有关繁忙时间请求和响应的示例，请参见附录B.5。

contents.text: 5.1. Status Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1. 状态代码

contents.text: The list below summarizes the most common status codes used for this method. However, clients need to be prepared to handle other 2/3/4/5xx series status codes as well.
contents.zh-CHS: 下表总结了用于此方法的最常见状态代码。但是，客户还需要准备好处理其他2/3/4/5xx系列状态代码。

contents.text: 200 (OK) - The command succeeded.
contents.zh-CHS: 200（确定）-命令成功。

contents.text: 204 (No Content) - The command succeeded.
contents.zh-CHS: 204（无内容）-命令成功。

contents.text: 400 (Bad Request) - The client has provided an invalid scheduling message.
contents.zh-CHS: 400（错误请求）-客户端提供了无效的计划消息。

contents.text: 403 (Forbidden) - The client cannot submit a scheduling message to the specified Request-URI.
contents.zh-CHS: 403（禁止）-客户端无法向指定的请求URI提交计划消息。

contents.text: 404 (Not Found) - The URL in the Request-URI was not present.
contents.zh-CHS: 404（未找到）-请求URI中的URL不存在。

contents.text: 423 (Locked) - The specified resource is locked, and the client either is not a lock owner or the lock type requires a lock token to be submitted and the client did not submit it.
contents.zh-CHS: 423（已锁定）-指定的资源已锁定，客户端不是锁所有者，或者锁类型要求提交锁令牌，但客户端未提交。

contents.text: 5.2. Additional Method Preconditions
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2. 附加方法前提条件

contents.text: The following are existing preconditions that are reused for the POST method on an Outbox collection.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是在发件箱集合上对POST方法重用的现有先决条件。

contents.text: o DAV:need-privileges [RFC3744]
contents.zh-CHS: o DAV:需要特权[RFC3744]

contents.text: o CALDAV:supported-calendar-data [RFC4791]
contents.zh-CHS: o CALDAV:支持的日历数据[RFC4791]

contents.text: o CALDAV:valid-calendar-data [RFC4791]
contents.zh-CHS: o CALDAV:有效的日历数据[RFC4791]

contents.text: o CALDAV:max-resource-size [RFC4791]
contents.zh-CHS: o CALDAV:最大资源大小[RFC4791]

contents.text: The following are new method preconditions for the POST method on an Outbox collection.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是发件箱集合上POST方法的新方法先决条件。

contents.text: 5.2.1. CALDAV:valid-scheduling-message Precondition
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2.1. CALDAV:有效的调度消息前提条件

contents.text: Name: valid-scheduling-message
contents.zh-CHS: 名称：有效的计划消息

contents.text: Namespace:  urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav
Apply to: POST
contents.zh-CHS: 申请：邮政

contents.text: Use with: 400 Bad Request
contents.zh-CHS: 用于：400错误请求

contents.text: Purpose: (precondition) -- The resource submitted in the POST request MUST obey all the restrictions specified in Section 3.3.2 of iTIP [RFC5546].
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：（前提条件）——POST请求中提交的资源必须遵守iTIP[RFC5546]第3.3.2节规定的所有限制。

contents.text: Definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义：

contents.text: <!ELEMENT valid-scheduling-message EMPTY>
5.2.2. CALDAV:valid-organizer Precondition
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2.2. CALDAV:有效的组织者先决条件

contents.text: Name: valid-organizer
contents.zh-CHS: 名称：有效组织者

contents.text: Namespace:  urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav
Apply to: POST
contents.zh-CHS: 申请：邮政

contents.text: Use with: 403 Forbidden
contents.zh-CHS: 使用：403禁止

contents.text: Purpose: (precondition) -- The "ORGANIZER" property value in the POST request's scheduling message MUST match one of the calendar user addresses of the owner of the scheduling Outbox collection being targeted by the request.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：（先决条件）--POST请求的计划消息中的“ORGANIZER”属性值必须与请求所针对的计划发件箱集合所有者的日历用户地址之一匹配。

contents.text: Definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义：

contents.text: <!ELEMENT valid-organizer EMPTY>
6. Scheduling Privileges
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 调度权限

contents.text: New scheduling privileges are defined in this section. All the scheduling privileges MUST be non-abstract and MUST appear in the DAV:supported-privilege-set property of scheduling Outbox and Inbox collections on which they are defined.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义了新的调度权限。所有调度权限必须是非抽象的，并且必须出现在定义它们的调度发件箱和收件箱集合的DAV:supported privilege set属性中。

contents.text: The tables specified in Appendix A clarify which scheduling methods (e.g., "REQUEST", "REPLY", etc.) are controlled by each scheduling privilege defined in this section.
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A中规定的表格阐明了哪些调度方法（例如，“请求”、“回复”等）由本节中定义的每个调度权限控制。

contents.text: 6.1. Privileges on Scheduling Inbox Collections
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1. 安排收件箱集合的权限

contents.text: This section defines new WebDAV Access Control List (ACL) [RFC3744] privileges that are defined for use on scheduling Inbox collections. These privileges determine whether delivery of scheduling messages from a calendar user is allowed by the calendar user who "owns" the scheduling Inbox collection. This allows calendar users to choose which other calendar users can schedule with them.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义了新的WebDAV访问控制列表（ACL）[RFC3744]权限，这些权限是为安排收件箱集合而定义的。这些权限确定“拥有”计划收件箱集合的日历用户是否允许从日历用户传递计划邮件。这允许日历用户选择其他日历用户可以与其一起安排的日程。

contents.text: Note that when a scheduling message is delivered to a calendar user, in addition to a scheduling object resource being created in the calendar user's scheduling Inbox collection, a new scheduling object resource might be created or an existing one updated in a calendar belonging to the calendar user. In that case, the ability to create or update the scheduling object resource in the calendar is controlled by the privileges assigned to the scheduling Inbox collection.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，当调度消息传递给日历用户时，除了在日历用户的调度收件箱集合中创建调度对象资源外，还可能在属于日历用户的日历中创建新的调度对象资源或更新现有的调度对象资源。在这种情况下，在日历中创建或更新计划对象资源的能力由分配给计划收件箱集合的权限控制。

contents.text: The privileges defined in this section are ignored if applied to a resource other than a scheduling Inbox collection.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果将此部分中定义的权限应用于计划收件箱集合以外的资源，则将忽略此部分中定义的权限。

contents.text: 6.1.1. CALDAV:schedule-deliver Privilege
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1.1. CALDAV：计划交付特权

contents.text: CALDAV:schedule-deliver is an aggregate privilege as per Section 6.3.
contents.zh-CHS: CALDAV：根据第6.3节，计划交付是一种聚合特权。

contents.text: <!ELEMENT schedule-deliver EMPTY>
6.1.2. CALDAV:schedule-deliver-invite Privilege
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1.2. CALDAV:计划传递邀请权限

contents.text: The CALDAV:schedule-deliver-invite privilege controls the processing and delivery of scheduling messages coming from an "Organizer".
contents.zh-CHS: CALDAV:schedule deliver invite特权控制来自“组织者”的调度消息的处理和传递。

contents.text: <!ELEMENT schedule-deliver-invite EMPTY>
6.1.3. CALDAV:schedule-deliver-reply Privilege
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1.3. CALDAV:计划传递答复权限

contents.text: The CALDAV:schedule-deliver-reply privilege controls the processing and delivery of scheduling messages coming from an "Attendee".
contents.zh-CHS: CALDAV:schedule deliver reply权限控制来自“与会者”的日程安排消息的处理和传递。

contents.text: <!ELEMENT schedule-deliver-reply EMPTY>
6.1.4. CALDAV:schedule-query-freebusy Privilege
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1.4. CALDAV:计划查询忙/闲特权

contents.text: The CALDAV:schedule-query-freebusy privilege controls freebusy requests targeted at the owner of the scheduling Inbox collection.
contents.zh-CHS: CALDAV:schedule query freebush特权控制针对计划收件箱集合所有者的freebush请求。

contents.text: <!ELEMENT schedule-query-freebusy EMPTY>
6.2. Privileges on Scheduling Outbox Collections
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2. 调度发件箱集合的权限

contents.text: This section defines new WebDAV ACL [RFC3744] privileges that are defined for use on scheduling Outbox collections. These privileges determine which calendar users are allowed to send scheduling messages on behalf of the calendar user who "owns" the scheduling Outbox collection. This allows calendar users to choose other calendar users who can act on their behalf (e.g., assistants working on behalf of their boss).
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义了新的WebDAV ACL[RFC3744]权限，这些权限是为调度发件箱集合而定义的。这些权限决定允许哪些日历用户代表“拥有”调度发件箱集合的日历用户发送调度消息。这允许日历用户选择可以代表其行事的其他日历用户（例如，代表其上司工作的助理）。

contents.text: The privileges defined in this section are ignored if applied to a resource other than a scheduling Outbox collection.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果将此部分中定义的权限应用于非计划发件箱集合的资源，则将忽略此部分中定义的权限。

contents.text: 6.2.1. CALDAV:schedule-send Privilege
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.1. CALDAV:计划发送权限

contents.text: CALDAV:schedule-send is an aggregate privilege as per Section 6.3.
contents.zh-CHS: CALDAV：根据第6.3节，计划发送是一种聚合权限。

contents.text: <!ELEMENT schedule-send EMPTY>
6.2.2. CALDAV:schedule-send-invite Privilege
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.2. CALDAV:计划发送邀请权限

contents.text: The CALDAV:schedule-send-invite privilege controls the sending of scheduling messages by "Organizers".
contents.zh-CHS: CALDAV:schedule send invite特权控制“组织者”发送计划消息。

contents.text: Users granted the DAV:bind privilege on a calendar collection, or the DAV:write privilege on scheduling object resources, will also need the CALDAV:schedule-send-invite privilege granted on the scheduling Outbox collection of the owner of the calendar collection or scheduling object resource in order to be allowed to create, modify, or delete scheduling object resources in a way that will trigger the CalDAV server to deliver scheduling messages to "Attendees".
contents.zh-CHS: 在日历集合上授予DAV:bind权限或在调度对象资源上授予DAV:write权限的用户还需要在日历集合或调度对象资源所有者的调度发件箱集合上授予CALDAV:schedule send invite权限，以便允许创建、修改、，或者删除调度对象资源，以触发CalDAV服务器向“与会者”发送调度消息。

contents.text: <!ELEMENT schedule-send-invite EMPTY>
6.2.3. CALDAV:schedule-send-reply Privilege
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.3. CALDAV:计划发送回复权限

contents.text: The CALDAV:schedule-send-reply privilege controls the sending of scheduling messages by "Attendees".
contents.zh-CHS: CALDAV:schedule send reply权限控制“与会者”发送日程安排消息。

contents.text: Users granted the DAV:bind privilege on a calendar collection, or the DAV:write privilege on scheduling object resources, will also need the CALDAV:schedule-send-reply privilege granted on the scheduling Outbox collection of the owner of the calendar collection or scheduling object resource in order to be allowed to create, modify, or delete scheduling object resources in a way that will trigger the CalDAV server to deliver scheduling message replies to the "Organizer".
contents.zh-CHS: 在日历集合上授予DAV:bind权限或在调度对象资源上授予DAV:write权限的用户还需要在日历集合或调度对象资源所有者的调度发件箱集合上授予CALDAV:schedule send reply权限，以便允许创建、修改、，或删除调度对象资源，其方式将触发CalDAV服务器向“组织者”发送调度消息答复。

contents.text: <!ELEMENT schedule-send-reply EMPTY>
6.2.4. CALDAV:schedule-send-freebusy Privilege
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.4. CALDAV:计划发送忙/闲特权

contents.text: The CALDAV:schedule-send-freebusy privilege controls the use of the POST method to submit scheduling messages that specify the scheduling method "REQUEST" with a "VFREEBUSY" calendar component.
contents.zh-CHS: CALDAV:schedule send freebusy特权控制POST方法提交调度消息的使用，该消息使用“VFREEBUSY”日历组件指定调度方法“REQUEST”。

contents.text: <!ELEMENT schedule-send-freebusy EMPTY>
6.3. Aggregation of Scheduling Privileges
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3. 调度权限的聚合

contents.text: Server implementations MUST aggregate the scheduling privileges as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器实现必须按如下方式聚合调度权限：

contents.text: DAV:all contains CALDAV:schedule-deliver and CALDAV:schedule-send;

CALDAV:schedule-deliver contains CALDAV:schedule-deliver-invite,
CALDAV:schedule-deliver-reply, and CALDAV:schedule-query-freebusy;
CALDAV:schedule-send contains CALDAV:schedule-send-invite, CALDAV: schedule-send-reply, and CALDAV:schedule-send-freebusy.
contents.zh-CHS: CALDAV:schedule send包含CALDAV:schedule send invite、CALDAV:schedule send reply和CALDAV:schedule send freebusy。

contents.text: The following diagram illustrates how scheduling privileges are aggregated according to the above requirements.
contents.zh-CHS: 下图说明了如何根据上述要求聚合调度权限。

contents.text:
[DAV:all] (aggregate)
    |
    +-- [CALDAV:schedule-deliver] (aggregate)
    |      |
    |      +-- [CALDAV:schedule-deliver-invite]
    |      +-- [CALDAV:schedule-deliver-reply]
    |      +-- [CALDAV:schedule-query-freebusy]
    |
    +-- [CALDAV:schedule-send] (aggregate)
           |
           +-- [CALDAV:schedule-send-invite]
           +-- [CALDAV:schedule-send-reply]
           +-- [CALDAV:schedule-send-freebusy]
7. Additional iCalendar Property Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 附加iCalendar属性参数

contents.text: This specification defines additional iCalendar property parameters to support the CalDAV scheduling extensions.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范定义了其他iCalendar属性参数，以支持CalDAV调度扩展。

contents.text: 7.1. Schedule Agent Parameter
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1. 调度代理参数

contents.text: Parameter Name: SCHEDULE-AGENT
contents.zh-CHS: 参数名称：SCHEDULE-AGENT

contents.text: Purpose: To specify the agent expected to deliver scheduling messages to the corresponding "Organizer" or "Attendee".
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指定希望将计划消息传递给相应“组织者”或“与会者”的代理。

contents.text: Format Definition: This property parameter is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：此属性参数由以下符号定义：

contents.text:
scheduleagentparam = "SCHEDULE-AGENT" "="
                 ("SERVER"      ; The server handles scheduling
                / "CLIENT"      ; The client handles scheduling
                / "NONE"        ; No scheduling
                / x-name        ; Experimental type
                / iana-token)   ; Other IANA-registered type
;
; If the parameter is not present, its value defaults to SERVER.
; "x-name" and "iana-token" are defined in Section 3.1 of
; [RFC5545].

Description: This property parameter MAY be specified on "ORGANIZER" or "ATTENDEE" iCalendar properties. In the absence of this parameter, the value "SERVER" MUST be used for the default behavior. The value determines whether or not a scheduling operation on a server will cause a scheduling message to be sent to the corresponding calendar user identified by the "ORGANIZER" or "ATTENDEE" property value. When the value "SERVER" is specified, or the parameter is absent, then it is the server's responsibility to send a scheduling message as part of a scheduling operation. When the value "CLIENT" is specified, that indicates that the client is handling scheduling messages with the calendar user itself. When "NONE" is specified, no scheduling messages are being sent to the calendar user.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：此属性参数可以在“组织者”或“与会者”iCalendar属性中指定。如果没有此参数，值“SERVER”必须用于默认行为。该值确定服务器上的计划操作是否会导致将计划消息发送给由“组织者”或“与会者”属性值标识的相应日历用户。如果指定了值“SERVER”，或者没有参数，则服务器负责发送调度消息，作为调度操作的一部分。指定值“CLIENT”时，表示客户端正在处理日历用户本身的计划消息。如果指定“无”，则不会向日历用户发送任何计划消息。

contents.text: Servers MUST NOT include this parameter in any scheduling messages sent as the result of a scheduling operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器不得在作为调度操作结果发送的任何调度消息中包含此参数。

contents.text: Clients MUST NOT include this parameter in any scheduling messages that they themselves send.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端不得在其自己发送的任何计划消息中包含此参数。

contents.text: The parameter value MUST be the same on every "ORGANIZER" property in a scheduling object resource.
contents.zh-CHS: 调度对象资源中每个“组织者”属性的参数值必须相同。

contents.text: The parameter value MUST be the same on each "ATTENDEE" property whose values match in a scheduling object resource.
contents.zh-CHS: 在调度对象资源中，其值匹配的每个“ATTENDEE”属性的参数值必须相同。

contents.text: Servers and clients MUST treat x-name and iana-token values they do not recognize the same way as they would the "NONE" value.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器和客户端必须处理x-name和iana令牌值，因为它们不能识别与“无”值相同的方式。

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text:
ORGANIZER;SCHEDULE-AGENT=SERVER:mailto:bernard@example.com
ATTENDEE;SCHEDULE-AGENT=NONE:mailto:cyrus@example.com
7.2. Schedule Force Send Parameter
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2. 计划强制发送参数

contents.text: Parameter Name: SCHEDULE-FORCE-SEND
contents.zh-CHS: 参数名称：SCHEDULE-FORCE-SEND

contents.text: Purpose: To force a scheduling message to be sent to the calendar user specified by the property.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：强制将计划消息发送给属性指定的日历用户。

contents.text: Format Definition: This property parameter is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：此属性参数由以下符号定义：

contents.text:
scheduleforcesendparam = "SCHEDULE-FORCE-SEND" "="
                       ("REQUEST"    ; Force a "REQUEST"
                      / "REPLY"      ; Force a "REPLY"
                      / iana-token)
;
; "iana-token" is defined in Section 3.1 of [RFC5545].  Its value
; MUST be an IANA-registered iCalendar "METHOD" property value.

Description: This property parameter MAY be specified on "ATTENDEE" and "ORGANIZER" properties on which the "SCHEDULE-AGENT" property parameter is set to the value "SERVER" or is not specified. This property parameter is used to force a server to send a scheduling message to a specific calendar user in situations where the server would not send a scheduling message otherwise (e.g., when no change that warrants the delivery of a new scheduling message was performed on the scheduling object resource). An "Organizer" MAY specify this parameter on an "ATTENDEE" property with the value "REQUEST" to force a "REQUEST" scheduling message to be sent to this "Attendee". An "Attendee" MAY specify this parameter on the "ORGANIZER" with the value "REPLY" to force a "REPLY" scheduling message to be sent to the "Organizer".
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：此属性参数可以在“与会者”和“组织者”属性上指定，在这些属性上，“日程安排代理”属性参数设置为值“服务器”或未指定。此属性参数用于在服务器不发送计划消息的情况下（例如，在计划对象资源上未执行任何更改以保证传递新的计划消息），强制服务器向特定日历用户发送计划消息。“组织者”可以在值为“REQUEST”的“ATTENDEE”属性上指定此参数，以强制将“REQUEST”计划消息发送到此“ATTENDEE”。“与会者”可以在“组织者”上指定此参数，其值为“回复”，以强制将“回复”计划消息发送给“组织者”。

contents.text: Servers MUST NOT preserve this property parameter in scheduling object resources, nor include it in any scheduling messages sent as the result of a scheduling operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器不得在调度对象资源中保留此属性参数，也不得将其包含在作为调度操作结果发送的任何调度消息中。

contents.text: Clients MUST NOT include this parameter in any scheduling messages that they themselves send.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端不得在其自己发送的任何计划消息中包含此参数。

contents.text: Servers MUST set the "SCHEDULE-STATUS" parameter of the "ATTENDEE" or "ORGANIZER" to 2.3 (i.e., "Success; invalid property parameter ignored"; see Section 3.6 of [RFC5546]) when the "SCHEDULE-FORCE-SEND" parameter is set to an iana-token value they do not recognize.
contents.zh-CHS: 当“SCHEDULE-FORCE-SEND”参数设置为无法识别的iana令牌值时，服务器必须将“ATTENDEE”或“ORGANIZER”的“SCHEDULE-STATUS”参数设置为2.3（即“Success；忽略无效属性参数；请参阅[RFC5546]第3.6节）。

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text:
ORGANIZER;SCHEDULE-FORCE-SEND=REPLY:mailto:cyrus@example.com
ATTENDEE;SCHEDULE-FORCE-SEND=REQUEST:mailto:bernard@example.com
7.3. Schedule Status Parameter
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3. 计划状态参数

contents.text: Parameter Name: SCHEDULE-STATUS
contents.zh-CHS: 参数名称：计划状态

contents.text: Purpose: To specify the status codes returned from processing of the most recent scheduling message sent to the corresponding "Attendee", or received from the corresponding "Organizer".
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指定处理发送给相应“与会者”或从相应“组织者”接收的最新日程安排消息时返回的状态代码。

contents.text: Format Definition: This property parameter is defined by the following notation:
contents.zh-CHS: 格式定义：此属性参数由以下符号定义：

contents.text:
schedulestatusparam = "SCHEDULE-STATUS" "="
                    ( statcode
                   / DQUOTE statcode *("," statcode) DQUOTE)
;
; "statcode" is defined in Section 3.8.8.3 of [RFC5545].  The
; value is a single "statcode" or a comma-separated list of
; "statcode" values.
Description: This property parameter MAY be specified on the "ATTENDEE" and "ORGANIZER" properties.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：此属性参数可以在“与会者”和“组织者”属性上指定。

contents.text: Servers MUST only add or change this property parameter on any "ATTENDEE" properties corresponding to calendar users who were sent a scheduling message via a scheduling operation. Clients SHOULD NOT change or remove this parameter if it was provided by the server. In the case where the client is handling the scheduling, the client MAY add, change, or remove this parameter to indicate the last scheduling message status it received.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器只能在与通过调度操作发送调度消息的日历用户相对应的任何“ATTENDEE”属性上添加或更改此属性参数。如果此参数是由服务器提供的，则客户端不应更改或删除此参数。在客户机正在处理调度的情况下，客户机可以添加、更改或删除此参数，以指示其收到的上一个调度消息状态。

contents.text: Servers MUST add this parameter to any "ORGANIZER" properties corresponding to calendar users who were sent a scheduling message reply by an "Attendee" via a scheduling operation. Clients SHOULD NOT change or remove this parameter if it was provided by the server. In the case where the client is handling the scheduling, the client MAY add, change, or remove this parameter to indicate the last scheduling message status it received.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器必须将此参数添加到与日历用户对应的任何“组织者”属性中，日历用户通过调度操作收到“与会者”发送的调度消息答复。如果此参数是由服务器提供的，则客户端不应更改或删除此参数。在客户机正在处理调度的情况下，客户机可以添加、更改或删除此参数，以指示其收到的上一个调度消息状态。

contents.text: Servers MUST NOT include this parameter in any scheduling messages sent as the result of a scheduling operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器不得在作为调度操作结果发送的任何调度消息中包含此参数。

contents.text: Clients MUST NOT include this parameter in any scheduling messages that they themselves send.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端不得在其自己发送的任何计划消息中包含此参数。

contents.text: Values for this property parameter are described in Section 3.2.9.
contents.zh-CHS: 第3.2.9节描述了该特性参数的值。

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text:
ATTENDEE;SCHEDULE-STATUS="2.0":mailto:bernard@example.com
ATTENDEE;SCHEDULE-STATUS="2.0,2.4":mailto:cyrus@example.com
8. Additional Message Header Fields
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 其他消息头字段

contents.text: This specification defines additional HTTP request and response headers for use with CalDAV.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范定义了用于CalDAV的其他HTTP请求和响应头。

contents.text: 8.1. Schedule-Reply Request Header
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1. 调度应答请求头

contents.text: Schedule-Reply = "Schedule-Reply" ":" ("T" | "F")
Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: Schedule-Reply: F
contents.zh-CHS: 附表答复：F

contents.text: When an "Attendee" removes a scheduling object resource as per Section 3.2.2.4, and the Schedule-Reply header is set to the value "T" (true) or is not present, the server MUST send an appropriate reply scheduling message with the "Attendee's" "PARTSTAT" iCalendar property parameter value set to "DECLINED" as part of its normal scheduling operation processing.
contents.zh-CHS: 当“与会者”根据第3.2.2.4节删除计划对象资源，并且计划回复标头设置为值“T”（true）或不存在时，服务器必须发送适当的回复计划消息，并将“与会者的”“PARTSTAT”iCalendar属性参数值设置为“谢绝”作为其正常调度操作处理的一部分。

contents.text: When the Schedule-Reply header is set to the value "F" (false), the server MUST NOT send a scheduling message as part of its normal scheduling operation processing.
contents.zh-CHS: 当Schedule Reply标头设置为值“F”（false）时，服务器不得发送调度消息作为其正常调度操作处理的一部分。

contents.text: The Schedule-Reply request header is used by a client to indicate to a server whether or not a scheduling operation ought to occur when an "Attendee" deletes a scheduling object resource. In particular, it controls whether a reply scheduling message is sent to the "Organizer" as a result of the removal. There are situations in which unsolicited scheduling messages need to be silently removed (or ignored) for security or privacy reasons. This request header allows the scheduling object resource to be removed if such a need arises.
contents.zh-CHS: 当“与会者”删除调度对象资源时，客户端使用调度应答请求头向服务器指示是否应该执行调度操作。特别是，它控制是否由于删除而向“组织者”发送回复计划消息。在某些情况下，出于安全或隐私原因，需要悄悄删除（或忽略）未经请求的计划消息。如果需要，此请求头允许删除调度对象资源。

contents.text: 8.2. Schedule-Tag Response Header
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2. 调度标记响应头

contents.text: The Schedule-Tag response header provides the current value of the CALDAV:schedule-tag property value. The behavior of this response header is described in Section 3.2.10.
contents.zh-CHS: Schedule Tag response标头提供CALDAV:Schedule Tag属性值的当前值。第3.2.10节描述了该响应标题的行为。

contents.text: All scheduling object resources MUST support the Schedule-Tag header.
contents.zh-CHS: 所有调度对象资源都必须支持调度标记标头。

contents.text: Schedule-Tag = "Schedule-Tag" ":" opaque-tag ; "opaque-tag" is defined in Section 3.11 of [RFC2616].
contents.zh-CHS: Schedule Tag=“Schedule Tag”“：”不透明标记；[RFC2616]第3.11节定义了“不透明标签”。

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: Schedule-Tag: "12ab34-cd56ef"
contents.zh-CHS: 计划标签：“12ab34-cd56ef”

contents.text: 8.3. If-Schedule-Tag-Match Request Header
contents.zh-CHS: 8.3. 如果计划标记与请求头匹配

contents.text: The If-Schedule-Tag-Match request header field is used with a method to make it conditional. Clients can set this header to the value returned in the Schedule-Tag response header, or the CALDAV:schedule-tag property, of a scheduling object resource previously retrieved from the server to avoid overwriting "consequential" changes to the scheduling object resource.
contents.zh-CHS: If Schedule Tag Match request header字段与方法一起使用，以使其具有条件。客户端可以将此标头设置为以前从服务器检索到的调度对象资源的调度标记响应标头中返回的值，或CALDAV:Schedule-Tag属性，以避免覆盖对调度对象资源的“相应”更改。

contents.text: All scheduling object resources MUST support the If-Schedule-Tag-Match header.
contents.zh-CHS: 所有调度对象资源都必须支持If调度标记匹配标头。

contents.text: If-Schedule-Tag-Match = "If-Schedule-Tag-Match" ":" opaque-tag ; "opaque-tag" is defined in Section 3.11 of [RFC2616].
contents.zh-CHS: If Schedule Tag Match=“If Schedule Tag Match”“：”不透明标记；[RFC2616]第3.11节定义了“不透明标签”。

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: If-Schedule-Tag-Match: "12ab34-cd56ef"
contents.zh-CHS: 如果计划标签匹配：“12ab34-cd56ef”

contents.text: 9. Additional WebDAV Properties
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 其他WebDAV属性

contents.text: This specification defines the following new WebDAV properties for use with CalDAV.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范定义了以下与CalDAV一起使用的新WebDAV属性。

contents.text: 9.1. CALDAV:schedule-calendar-transp Property
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1. CALDAV:日程日历传输属性

contents.text: Name: schedule-calendar-transp
contents.zh-CHS: 名称：日程日历运输

contents.text: Namespace:  urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav
Purpose: Determines whether the calendar object resources in a calendar collection will affect the owner's busy time information.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：确定日历集合中的日历对象资源是否会影响所有者的繁忙时间信息。

contents.text: Protected: This property MAY be protected and SHOULD NOT be returned by a PROPFIND DAV:allprop request (as defined in Section 14.2 of [RFC4918]).
contents.zh-CHS: 受保护：此属性可能受保护，不应通过PROPFIND DAV:allprop请求返回（定义见[RFC4918]第14.2节）。

contents.text: COPY/MOVE behavior: This property value SHOULD be kept during a MOVE operation, and SHOULD be copied and preserved in a COPY.
contents.zh-CHS: 复制/移动行为：此属性值应在移动操作期间保留，并应在副本中复制和保留。

contents.text: Description: This property SHOULD be defined on all calendar collections. If present, it contains one of two XML elements that indicate whether the calendar object resources in the calendar collection ought to contribute to the owner's busy time. When the CALDAV:opaque element is used, all calendar object resources in the corresponding calendar collection MUST contribute to busy time, assuming that access privileges and other iCalendar properties allow it to. When the CALDAV:transparent XML element is used, the calendar object resources in the corresponding calendar collection MUST NOT contribute to busy time.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：应在所有日历集合上定义此属性。如果存在，它将包含两个XML元素之一，这两个XML元素指示日历集合中的日历对象资源是否应该为所有者的繁忙时间做出贡献。使用CALDAV:opaque元素时，假设访问权限和其他iCalendar属性允许，则相应日历集合中的所有日历对象资源都必须占用繁忙时间。使用CALDAV:transparent XML元素时，相应日历集合中的日历对象资源不得影响繁忙时间。

contents.text: If this property is not present on a calendar collection, then the default value CALDAV:opaque MUST be assumed.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果日历集合上不存在此属性，则必须假定默认值CALDAV:opaque。

contents.text: Definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义：

contents.text: <!ELEMENT schedule-calendar-transp (opaque | transparent)>

<!ELEMENT opaque EMPTY>
<!-- Affects busy time searches -->

<!ELEMENT transparent EMPTY>
<!-- Invisible to busy time searches -->
Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text:
<C:schedule-calendar-transp
     xmlns:C="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav">
  <C:opaque/>
</C:schedule-calendar-transp>
9.2. CALDAV:schedule-default-calendar-URL Property
contents.zh-CHS: 9.2. CALDAV:计划默认日历URL属性

contents.text: Name: schedule-default-calendar-URL
contents.zh-CHS: 名称：计划默认日历URL

contents.text: Namespace:  urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav
Purpose: Specifies a default calendar for an "Attendee" where new scheduling object resources are created.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指定“与会者”的默认日历，在该日历中创建新的日程安排对象资源。

contents.text: Protected: This property MAY be protected in the case where a server does not support changing the default calendar, or does not support a default calendar.
contents.zh-CHS: 受保护：当服务器不支持更改默认日历或不支持默认日历时，此属性可能受到保护。

contents.text: COPY/MOVE behavior: This property is only defined on a scheduling Inbox collection that cannot be moved or copied.
contents.zh-CHS: 复制/移动行为：此属性仅在无法移动或复制的计划收件箱集合上定义。

contents.text: Description: This property MAY be defined on a scheduling Inbox collection. If present, it contains zero or one DAV:href XML elements. When a DAV:href element is present, its value indicates a URL to a calendar collection that is used as the default calendar. When no DAV:href element is present, it indicates that there is no default calendar. In the absence of this property, there is no default calendar. When there is no default calendar, the server is free to choose the calendar in which a new scheduling object resource is created. See Section 4.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：此属性可以在计划收件箱集合上定义。如果存在，则它包含零个或一个DAV:href XML元素。当存在DAV:href元素时，其值表示用作默认日历的日历集合的URL。如果没有DAV:href元素，则表示没有默认日历。如果没有此属性，则没有默认日历。如果没有默认日历，服务器可以自由选择在其中创建新调度对象资源的日历。见第4.3节。

contents.text: Definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义：

contents.text: <!ELEMENT schedule-default-calendar-URL (DAV:href?)>
Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text:
<C:schedule-default-calendar-URL xmlns:D="DAV:"
    xmlns:C="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav">
  <D:href>/home/cyrus/calendars/work/</D:href>
</C:schedule-default-calendar-URL>
9.3. CALDAV:schedule-tag Property
contents.zh-CHS: 9.3. CALDAV:明细表标记属性

contents.text: Name: schedule-tag
contents.zh-CHS: 名称：计划标签

contents.text: Namespace:  urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav
Purpose: Indicates whether a scheduling object resource has had a "consequential" change made to it.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：指示调度对象资源是否有“相应”更改。

contents.text: Value: opaque-tag (defined in Section 3.11 of [RFC2616])
contents.zh-CHS: 值：不透明标签（定义见[RFC2616]第3.11节）

contents.text: Protected: This property MUST be protected, as only the server can update the value.
contents.zh-CHS: 受保护：必须保护此属性，因为只有服务器才能更新该值。

contents.text: COPY/MOVE behavior: This property value is determined by the server and MAY be different from the value on the source resource.
contents.zh-CHS: 复制/移动行为：此属性值由服务器确定，可能与源资源上的值不同。

contents.text: Description: The CALDAV:schedule-tag property MUST be defined on all scheduling object resources. This property is described in Section 3.2.10.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：必须在所有调度对象资源上定义CALDAV:schedule标记属性。第3.2.10节描述了该特性。

contents.text: Definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义：

contents.text: <!ELEMENT schedule-tag (#PCDATA)>
Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text:
<C:schedule-tag xmlns:C="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav"
>"12345-67890"</C:schedule-tag>
10. XML Element Definitions
contents.zh-CHS: 10. XML元素定义

contents.text: 10.1. CALDAV:schedule-response XML Element
contents.zh-CHS: 10.1. CALDAV：调度响应XML元素

contents.text: Name: schedule-response
contents.zh-CHS: 名称：进度响应

contents.text: Namespace:  urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav
Purpose: Contains the set of responses for a POST method request.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：包含POST方法请求的响应集。

contents.text: Description: See Section 5.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：见第5节。

contents.text: Definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义：

contents.text: <!ELEMENT schedule-response (response*)>
10.2. CALDAV:response XML Element
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2. CALDAV：响应XML元素

contents.text: Name: response
contents.zh-CHS: 姓名：回应

contents.text: Namespace:  urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav
Purpose: Contains a single response for a POST method request.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的：包含POST方法请求的单个响应。

contents.text: Description: See Section 5.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：见第5节。

contents.text: Definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义：

contents.text: <!ELEMENT response (recipient, request-status, calendar-data?, DAV:error?, DAV:responsedescription?)>
contents.zh-CHS: <!元素响应（收件人、请求状态、日历数据？、DAV:错误？、DAV:响应描述？>

contents.text:
<!-- CALDAV:calendar-data is defined in Section 9.6 of
RFC 4791 and when used here uses the definition with
content (#PCDATA) only. -->
10.3. CALDAV:recipient XML Element
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3. CALDAV：收件人XML元素

contents.text: Name: recipient
contents.zh-CHS: 姓名：收件人

contents.text: Namespace:  urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav
Purpose: The calendar user address that the enclosing response for a POST method request is for.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：用于POST方法请求的封闭响应的日历用户地址。

contents.text: Description: See Section 5.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：见第5节。

contents.text: Definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义：

contents.text: <!ELEMENT recipient (DAV:href)>
10.4. CALDAV:request-status XML Element
contents.zh-CHS: 10.4. CALDAV：请求状态XML元素

contents.text: Name: request-status
contents.zh-CHS: 名称：请求状态

contents.text: Namespace:  urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav
Purpose: The iTIP "REQUEST-STATUS" property value for this response.
contents.zh-CHS: 用途：此响应的iTIP“请求状态”属性值。

contents.text: Description: See Section 5.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：见第5节。

contents.text: Definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义：

contents.text: <!ELEMENT request-status (#PCDATA)>
11. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 11. 安全考虑

contents.text: The process of scheduling involves the sending and receiving of scheduling messages. As a result, the security problems related to messaging in general are relevant here. In particular, the authenticity of the scheduling messages needs to be verified. Servers and clients MUST use an HTTP connection protected with Transport Layer Security (TLS) as defined in [RFC2818] for all scheduling operations. Clients MUST use the procedures detailed in Section 6 of [RFC6125] to verify the authenticity of the server. Servers MUST make use of HTTP authentication [RFC2617] to verify the authenticity of the calendar user for whom the client is sending requests.
contents.zh-CHS: 调度过程包括发送和接收调度消息。因此，与消息传递相关的安全问题通常与此相关。特别是，需要验证调度消息的真实性。对于所有调度操作，服务器和客户端必须使用[RFC2818]中定义的受传输层安全性（TLS）保护的HTTP连接。客户端必须使用[RFC6125]第6节中详述的程序来验证服务器的真实性。服务器必须使用HTTP身份验证[RFC2617]来验证客户端为其发送请求的日历用户的真实性。

contents.text: 11.1. Preventing Denial-of-Service Attacks
contents.zh-CHS: 11.1. 防止拒绝服务攻击

contents.text: Servers MUST ensure that clients cannot consume excessive server resources by carrying out "large" scheduling operations. In particular, servers SHOULD enforce CALDAV:max-resource-size, CALDAV: max-instances, and CALDAV:max-attendees-per-instance preconditions as applicable for scheduling Inbox and Outbox collections.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器必须确保客户端不能通过执行“大型”调度操作来消耗过多的服务器资源。特别是，服务器应强制执行CALDAV:max resource size、CALDAV:max instances和CALDAV:max attendeers per instance先决条件（适用于安排收件箱和发件箱集合）。

contents.text: 11.2. Verifying Scheduling Operations
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2. 验证调度操作

contents.text: When handling a scheduling operation:
contents.zh-CHS: 处理计划操作时：

contents.text: 1. Servers MUST verify that the principal associated with the DAV: owner of the calendar collection in which a scheduling object resource is being manipulated contains a CALDAV:schedule-outbox-URL property value.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 服务器必须验证与正在其中操作调度对象资源的日历集合的DAV:owner关联的主体是否包含CALDAV:schedule发件箱URL属性值。

contents.text: 2. Servers MUST verify that the currently authenticated user has the CALDAV:schedule-send privilege, or a sub-privilege aggregated under this privilege, on the scheduling Outbox collection of the DAV:owner of the calendar collection in which a scheduling object resource is being manipulated.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 服务器必须验证当前经过身份验证的用户是否具有CALDAV:schedule send权限，或者在正在操作调度对象资源的日历集合的DAV:owner的调度发件箱集合上具有在此权限下聚合的子权限。

contents.text: 3. Servers MUST only deliver scheduling messages to recipients when the CALDAV:schedule-deliver privilege, or a sub-privilege aggregated under this privilege, is granted on the recipient's scheduling Inbox collection for the principal associated with the DAV:owner of the calendar collection in which a scheduling object resource is being manipulated.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 对于与正在操作调度对象资源的日历集合的DAV:所有者关联的主体，在收件人的调度收件箱集合上授予CALDAV:schedule deliver权限或在此权限下聚合的子权限时，服务器只能将调度消息传递给收件人。

contents.text: 4. To prevent impersonation of calendar users, the server MUST verify that the "ORGANIZER" property in an organizer scheduling object resource matches one of the calendar user addresses of the DAV:owner of the calendar collection in which the resource is stored.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 若要防止模拟日历用户，服务器必须验证ORGANIZER调度对象资源中的“ORGANIZER”属性是否与存储资源的日历集合的DAV:所有者的日历用户地址之一匹配。

contents.text: 5. To prevent spoofing of an existing scheduling object resource, servers MUST verify that the "UID" iCalendar property value in a new scheduling object resource does not match that of an existing scheduling object resource with a different "ORGANIZER" property value.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 为防止对现有调度对象资源进行欺骗，服务器必须验证新调度对象资源中的“UID”iCalendar属性值与具有不同“ORGANIZER”属性值的现有调度对象资源的“UID”iCalendar属性值不匹配。

contents.text: 11.3. Verifying Busy Time Information Requests
contents.zh-CHS: 11.3. 验证繁忙时间信息请求

contents.text: When handling a POST request on a scheduling Outbox collection:
contents.zh-CHS: 在调度发件箱集合上处理POST请求时：

contents.text: 1. Servers MUST verify that the principal associated with the calendar user address specified in the "ORGANIZER" property of the scheduling message data in the request contains a CALDAV: schedule-outbox-URL property value that matches the scheduling Outbox collection targeted by the request.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 服务器必须验证与请求中计划消息数据的“ORGANIZER”属性中指定的日历用户地址关联的主体是否包含与请求所针对的计划发件箱集合匹配的CALDAV:schedule outbox URL属性值。

contents.text: 2. Servers MUST verify that the currently authenticated user has the CALDAV:schedule-send privilege, or a sub-privilege aggregated under this privilege, on the scheduling Outbox collection targeted by the request.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 服务器必须验证当前经过身份验证的用户在请求所针对的调度发件箱集合上是否具有CALDAV:schedule send权限或在此权限下聚合的子权限。

contents.text: 3. Servers MUST only return valid freebusy information for recipients when the CALDAV:schedule-deliver privilege, or a sub-privilege aggregated under this privilege, is granted on the recipient's scheduling Inbox collection for the principal associated with the DAV:owner of the scheduling Outbox collection targeted by the request.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 对于与请求所针对的调度发件箱集合的DAV:所有者关联的主体，在收件人的调度收件箱集合上授予CALDAV:schedule deliver权限或在此权限下聚合的子权限时，服务器只能为收件人返回有效的忙/闲信息。

contents.text: 11.4. Privacy Issues
contents.zh-CHS: 11.4. 隐私问题

contents.text: This specification only defines how calendar users on the same server are able to schedule with each other -- unauthenticated users have no way to carry out scheduling operations. Access control privileges (as per Section 6) can control which of those users can schedule with others. Calendar users not wishing to expose their calendar information to other users can do so by denying privileges to specific users, or all users, for all scheduling operations, or perhaps only freebusy.
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范仅定义同一服务器上的日历用户如何相互调度—未经验证的用户无法执行调度操作。访问控制权限（根据第6节）可以控制哪些用户可以与其他人一起计划。不希望向其他用户公开其日历信息的日历用户可以通过拒绝特定用户或所有用户对所有调度操作的权限，或者可能仅限于忙/闲来实现。

contents.text: "Attendees" can also use the Schedule-Reply request header (Section 8.1) with the value set to "F" to prevent notification to an "Organizer" that a scheduling object resource was deleted. This allows "Attendees" to remove unwanted scheduling messages without any response to the "Organizer".
contents.zh-CHS: “与会者”还可以使用值设置为“F”的日程回复请求标头（第8.1节），以防止通知“组织者”日程对象资源已被删除。这允许“与会者”删除不需要的日程安排消息，而无需对“组织者”做出任何响应。

contents.text: Servers MUST NOT expose any private iCalendar data, or WebDAV resource state information (URLs, WebDAV properties, etc.) for one calendar user to another via scheduling messages or error responses to scheduling operations. In particular, as per Section 8.1 of [RFC4918], authorization errors MUST take preference over other errors.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器不得通过调度消息或对调度操作的错误响应将一个日历用户的任何私有iCalendar数据或WebDAV资源状态信息（URL、WebDAV属性等）公开给另一个日历用户。特别是，根据[RFC4918]第8.1节，授权错误必须优先于其他错误。

contents.text: 11.5. Mitigation of iTIP Threats
contents.zh-CHS: 11.5. 缓解iTIP威胁

contents.text: Section 6.1 of iTIP [RFC5546] defines a set of potential threats in a scheduling system, and Section 6.2 of [RFC5546] defines recommendations on how those can be addressed in protocols using iTIP. This specification addresses the iTIP threats in the following manner:
contents.zh-CHS: iTIP[RFC5546]第6.1节定义了调度系统中的一组潜在威胁，[RFC5546]第6.2节定义了如何在使用iTIP的协议中解决这些威胁的建议。本规范通过以下方式解决iTIP威胁：

contents.text: Spoofing the "Organizer": Addressed by item 4 in Section 11.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 欺骗“组织者”：通过第11.2节第4项解决。

contents.text: Spoofing the "Attendee": Addressed by Section 3.2.2.1 and item 2 in Section 11.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 欺骗“与会者”：由第3.2.2.1节和第11.2节第2项解决。

contents.text: Unauthorized Replacement of the "Organizer": Addressed by item 5 in Section 11.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 未经授权更换“组织者”：根据第11.2节第5项解决。

contents.text: Eavesdropping and Data Integrity: Addressed by requiring TLS.
contents.zh-CHS: 窃听和数据完整性：通过要求TLS解决。

contents.text: Flooding a Calendar: Addressed by requirements in Section 11.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 淹没日历：根据第11.1节的要求解决。

contents.text: Unauthorized REFRESH Requests: This specification does not support the REFRESH method.
contents.zh-CHS: 未经授权的刷新请求：此规范不支持刷新方法。

contents.text: 12.2. iCalendar Property Parameter Registrations
contents.zh-CHS: 12.2. iCalendar属性参数注册

contents.text: Appendix A. Scheduling Privileges Summary
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A.调度权限摘要

contents.text: A.1. Scheduling Inbox Privileges
contents.zh-CHS: A.1. 计划收件箱权限

contents.text: The following tables specify which scheduling privileges grant the right to a calendar user to deliver a scheduling message to the scheduling Inbox collection of another calendar user. The appropriate behavior depends on the calendar component type as well as the scheduling "METHOD" specified in the scheduling message.
contents.zh-CHS: 下表指定哪些调度权限授予日历用户向另一日历用户的调度收件箱集合传递调度消息的权限。适当的行为取决于日历组件类型以及计划消息中指定的计划“方法”。

contents.text: A.2. Scheduling Outbox Privileges
contents.zh-CHS: A.2. 计划发件箱权限

contents.text: The following tables specify which scheduling privileges grant the right to a calendar user to perform busy time information requests and to submit scheduling messages to other calendar users as the result of a scheduling operation. The appropriate behavior depends on the calendar component type as well as the scheduling "METHOD" specified in the scheduling message.
contents.zh-CHS: 下表指定哪些调度权限授予日历用户执行繁忙时间信息请求的权限，以及作为调度操作的结果向其他日历用户提交调度消息的权限。适当的行为取决于日历组件类型以及计划消息中指定的计划“方法”。

contents.text: Appendix B. Example Scheduling Operations
contents.zh-CHS: 附录B.调度操作示例

contents.text: This section describes some example scheduling operations that give a general idea of how scheduling is carried out between CalDAV clients and servers from the perspective of meeting "Organizers" and "Attendees".
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍了一些调度操作示例，从会议“组织者”和“与会者”的角度介绍了如何在CalDAV客户端和服务器之间执行调度。

contents.text: The server is assumed to be hosted in the "example.com" domain, and users whose email addresses are at the "example.com" domain are assumed to be hosted by the server. In addition, the email addresses in the "example.net" domain are also valid email addresses for calendar users hosted by the server. Calendar users with an email address at the "example.org" domain are assumed to not be hosted by the server.
contents.zh-CHS: 假定服务器托管在“example.com”域中，假定电子邮件地址位于“example.com”域的用户由服务器托管。此外，“example.net”域中的电子邮件地址也是服务器托管的日历用户的有效电子邮件地址。假设电子邮件地址位于“example.org”域的日历用户不由服务器托管。

contents.text: In the following examples, the requests and responses are incomplete and are only for illustrative purposes. In particular, HTTP authentication headers and behaviors are not shown, even though they are required in normal operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 在以下示例中，请求和响应不完整，仅用于说明目的。特别是，HTTP身份验证头和行为不会显示，即使在正常操作中需要它们。

contents.text: B.1. Example: "Organizer" Inviting Multiple "Attendees"
contents.zh-CHS: B.1. 示例：“组织者”邀请多个“与会者”

contents.text: In the following example, Cyrus invites Wilfredo, Bernard, and Mike to a single instance event by simply creating a new scheduling object resource in one of his calendar collections by using the PUT method.
contents.zh-CHS: 在下面的示例中，Cyrus邀请Wilfredo、Bernard和Mike参加单个实例事件，方法是使用PUT方法在他的一个日历集合中创建一个新的调度对象资源。

contents.text: >> Request <<

PUT /home/cyrus/calendars/work/9263504FD3AD.ics HTTP/1.1
Host: cal.example.com
Content-Type: text/calendar; charset="utf-8"
Content-Length: xxxx
If-None-Match: *

BEGIN:VCALENDAR
VERSION:2.0
PRODID:-//Example Corp.//CalDAV Client//EN
BEGIN:VEVENT
UID:9263504FD3AD
SEQUENCE:0
DTSTAMP:20090602T185254Z
DTSTART:20090602T160000Z
DTEND:20090602T170000Z
TRANSP:OPAQUE
SUMMARY:Lunch
ORGANIZER;CN="Cyrus Daboo":mailto:cyrus@example.com
ATTENDEE;CN="Cyrus Daboo";CUTYPE=INDIVIDUAL;PARTSTAT=ACCEPTED:
 mailto:cyrus@example.com
ATTENDEE;CN="Wilfredo Sanchez Vega";CUTYPE=INDIVIDUAL;PARTSTAT
 =NEEDS-ACTION;ROLE=REQ-PARTICIPANT;RSVP=TRUE:mailto:wilfredo@
 example.com
ATTENDEE;CN="Bernard Desruisseaux";CUTYPE=INDIVIDUAL;PARTSTAT=
 NEEDS-ACTION;ROLE=REQ-PARTICIPANT;RSVP=TRUE:mailto:bernard@ex
 ample.net
ATTENDEE;CN="Mike Douglass";CUTYPE=INDIVIDUAL;PARTSTAT=NEEDS-A
 CTION;RSVP=TRUE:mailto:mike@example.org
END:VEVENT
END:VCALENDAR
>> Response <<
HTTP/1.1 201 Created Content-Length: 0
contents.zh-CHS: HTTP/1.1 201创建的内容长度：0

contents.text:
Date: Tue, 02 Jun 2009 18:52:54 GMT
Last-Modified: Tue, 02 Jun 2009 18:52:54 GMT
ETag: "d85561cfe74a4e785eb4639451b434fb"
Schedule-Tag: "488177c8-2ea7-4176-a6cb-fab8cfccdea2"

Once the event creation has been completed, Cyrus's client will retrieve the event back from the server to get the schedule status of each "Attendee", as well as record the Schedule-Tag value for future use. In this example, the server reports that a scheduling message was delivered to Wilfredo, a scheduling message is still pending for Bernard, and the server was unable to deliver a scheduling message to Mike.
contents.zh-CHS: 事件创建完成后，Cyrus的客户端将从服务器检索事件，以获取每个“与会者”的日程状态，并记录日程标记值以备将来使用。在本例中，服务器报告调度消息已传递给Wilfredo，Bernard的调度消息仍处于挂起状态，并且服务器无法将调度消息传递给Mike。

contents.text: >> Request <<

GET /home/cyrus/calendars/work/9263504FD3AD.ics HTTP/1.1
Host: cal.example.com

B.2. Example: "Attendee" Receiving an Invitation
contents.zh-CHS: B.2. 示例：“与会者”收到邀请

B.3. Example: "Attendee" Replying to an Invitation
contents.zh-CHS: B.3. 示例：“与会者”回复邀请

contents.text: In the following example, Wilfredo accepts Cyrus's invitation and sets an alarm reminder on the event. It uses the If-Schedule-Tag-Match precondition behavior to ensure it does not overwrite any significant changes from the "Organizer" that might have occurred after it retrieved the initial resource data.
contents.zh-CHS: 在下面的示例中，Wilfredo接受Cyrus的邀请，并在事件上设置警报提醒。它使用If Schedule标记Match前置条件行为来确保它不会覆盖在检索初始资源数据后可能发生的来自“组织者”的任何重大更改。

contents.text: >> Request <<

PUT /home/wilfredo/calendars/work/BB64861C2228.ics HTTP/1.1
Host: cal.example.com
If-Schedule-Tag-Match: "e78f23ed-0188-4bab-938d-2aeb3324c7e8"
Content-Type: text/calendar; charset="utf-8"
Content-Length: xxxx

VERSION:2.0
PRODID:-//Example Corp.//CalDAV Client//EN

SEQUENCE:0
DTSTAMP:20090602T185254Z
DTSTART:20090602T160000Z
DTEND:20090602T170000Z
TRANSP:OPAQUE
SUMMARY:Lunch
ORGANIZER;CN="Cyrus Daboo":mailto:cyrus@example.com
ATTENDEE;CN="Cyrus Daboo";CUTYPE=INDIVIDUAL;PARTSTAT=ACCEPTED:
 mailto:cyrus@example.com

ATTENDEE;CN="Wilfredo Sanchez Vega";CUTYPE=INDIVIDUAL;PARTSTAT
 =ACCEPTED;ROLE=REQ-PARTICIPANT;RSVP=TRUE:mailto:wilfredo@exam
 ple.com
ATTENDEE;CN="Bernard Desruisseaux";CUTYPE=INDIVIDUAL;PARTSTAT=
 NEEDS-ACTION;ROLE=REQ-PARTICIPANT;RSVP=TRUE:mailto:bernard@ex
 ample.net
ATTENDEE;CN="Mike Douglass";CUTYPE=INDIVIDUAL;PARTSTAT=NEEDS-A
 CTION;RSVP=TRUE:mailto:mike@example.org
BEGIN:VALARM
TRIGGER:-PT15M

END:VALARM
END:VEVENT
END:VCALENDAR

B.4. Example: "Organizer" Receiving a Reply to an Invitation
contents.zh-CHS: B.4. 示例：“组织者”收到邀请回复

contents.text: On reception of Wilfredo's reply, Cyrus's server will automatically update Cyrus's scheduling object resource, make Wilfredo's scheduling message available in Cyrus's scheduling Inbox collection, and deliver an updated scheduling message to Bernard to share Wilfredo's updated participation status. In this example, Cyrus's client retrieves and deletes this scheduling message in his scheduling Inbox collection.
contents.zh-CHS: 收到Wilfredo的回复后，Cyrus的服务器将自动更新Cyrus的调度对象资源，在Cyrus的调度收件箱集合中提供Wilfredo的调度消息，并向Bernard发送更新的调度消息，以共享Wilfredo的更新参与状态。在本例中，Cyrus的客户端在其计划收件箱集合中检索并删除此计划消息。

contents.text: >> Request <<

B.6. Example: User Attempting to Invite "Attendee" on Behalf of "Organizer"
contents.zh-CHS: B.6. 示例：用户试图代表“组织者”邀请“与会者”

contents.text: In the following example, Cyrus attempts to create, on behalf of Wilfredo, an event with Bernard specified as an "Attendee". The request fails, since Wilfredo didn't grant Cyrus the right to invite other calendar users on his behalf.
contents.zh-CHS: 在下面的示例中，Cyrus试图代表Wilfredo创建一个事件，并将Bernard指定为“与会者”。请求失败，因为Wilfredo没有授予Cyrus代表他邀请其他日历用户的权利。

contents.text: >> Request <<

PUT /home/wilfredo/calendars/work/def456.ics HTTP/1.1
Host: cal.example.com
Content-Type: text/calendar; charset="utf-8"
Content-Length: xxxx
If-None-Match: *

VERSION:2.0

DTEND:20090603T000000Z

SUMMARY:Dinner
ORGANIZER;CN="Wilfredo Sanchez Vega":mailto:wilfredo@example.com
ATTENDEE;CN="Wilfredo Sanchez Vega";CUTYPE=INDIVIDUAL;PARTSTAT=A
 CCEPTED:mailto:wilfredo@example.com
ATTENDEE;CN="Bernard Desruisseaux";CUTYPE=INDIVIDUAL;PARTSTAT=NE
 EDS-ACTION;ROLE=REQ-PARTICIPANT;RSVP=TRUE:mailto:bernard@exampl
 e.net
END:VEVENT
END:VCALENDAR
>> Response <<

HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden
Content-Type: application/xml; charset="utf-8"
Content-Length: xxxx

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<D:error xmlns:D="DAV:" xmlns:C="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:caldav">
  <D:need-privileges>
    <D:resource>
      <D:href>/home/wilfredo/calendars/outbox/</D:href>
      <D:privilege><C:schedule-send-invite/></D:privilege>
    </D:resource>
  </D:need-privileges>
</D:error>
